title: Wall Street Moving Slowly on Road to Recruit From Black Colleges
itunes:title: Wall Street Moving Slowly on Road to Recruit From Black Colleges
description:
Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Max Abelson discusses big banks putting up billions to support racial equity, but inside their offices, progress is slow. Businessweek Politics Editor Amanda Kolson Hurley shares stories from Businessweek Magazine’s Cities issue. Bloomberg News Technology and E-Commerce Reporter Spencer Soper explains how Amazon is advising its delivery partners to prominently advertise that they don’t screen applicants for marijuana use. Dr. Rachel Dew, CEO of ModiHealth, talks about the telemedicine service addressing issues related to Covid-19. And we drive to the Close with Leo Kelly, CEO at Verdence Capital Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
